amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds in any way that might contribute to increasing homelessness of veterans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for benefits for homeless veterans and training and outreach programs maybe be used by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs in contravention of subchapter III of chapter 20 of title 38, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A027) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
